entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why was the "Individual User Accounts" option removed? #38583
  • Debug deployed asp.net core application in IIS is not working #38582
  • Pseudo header string reuse broken in .NET 6 #38581
  • Blazor dotnet 6: OnLogInSucceeded not being hit on RemoteAuthenticatorView #38580
  • Please fix template for ASP.Net + React #38579
  • .Net Core 6 Signal R Client to .Net Core 2 Signal R 1.0 Server #38577
  • Hotreload doesn't work on Blazo wasm (.NET6) #38576
  • [API Review] Support SkipStatusCodePages on endpoints and authorized routes #38573
    7.0-preview1
  • Misleading comment about UniqueJsonKeyClaimAction #38572
    .NET 7 Planning
  • AddOption/Service.Configure creating duplicated entries #38569
    .NET 7 Planning
  • MapFallbackToPage("/_Host") triggers AmbiguousMatchException in mixed Razor Pages / Blazor Server app with .NET 6.0 #38566
  • How to use IFormFile in .Net 6 #38562
  • Blazor WASM Hot Reload cli not working #38561

Closed

  • Hot reload breaks between compilations #36595
    .NET 7 Planning
  • @inject IWebHostEnvironment Environment in Page not working in .NET 6 #38384
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Implementing a custom IServer is not as easy as it should be now that some classes have been made internal #38503
  • Comma needs to be deleted #38578
  • Blazor Client-Server: Inconsistent Json serialization (camelCase ⟷ PascalCase) #38353
  • Adding any IHostedService via AddHostedService blocks Kestrel from starting on net6.0 VS2022 #38554
  • problem converting a 3.1 core app to 6.0, routing is using more than 12-13 gig of ram #38444
  • .NET6 PublishSingleFile got a Empty path name is not legal. (Parameter 'path') error #38493
  • Blazor wasm: Reference Javascript function with IJSObjectReference #38517
  • ValidationMessage doesn't work for Fluent RuleForEach #38571
  • [Blazor] SVG, emit numeric attributes with InvariantCulture #38568
  • user-secrets does not function on ubuntu 18.04 #32576
    .NET 7 Planning
  • IIS ApplicationInitialization tests are not running on helix #37419
    7.0-preview1
  • [Discussion] Announcement: TryParse and BindAsync discovery on Map* parameters will throw for invalid methods #36810
    Discussions
  • Lightweight and fast alternative to Partial View #38551
  • Problem with OpenId authentication on Blazor serverside. #38317
  • Error after update node_modules in template ASP.NET CORE with React.js #38359
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #38556
  • unsubscribe message or remove handlers in signalr? #38489
  • Possible bug in Visual Studio Professional 2022 Preview (64-bit) Version 17.0.0 Preview 6.0? #38365

PullRequests

Created

  • Split shadow copy tests #38575
    area-runtime
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4848324` to `3e0e32b` #38567
    area-infrastructure
  • HTTP/3: Write static header names #38565
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Update Docker images, queues, etc. #38563
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • HTTP/3: Remove TCS allocation with resettable value source #38560
    area-runtime

Merged

  • HTTP/3: Remove AsTask allocations #38559
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove Arm64-specific jobs in matrix pipelines #38564
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix a tiny typo #38574
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use window.document for React-Native #38340
    area-signalr
  • Support SkipStatusCodePages on endpoints and authorized routes #38509
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/5.0] Move off of expiring machine pools #38532
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/3.1] Move off of expiring machine pools #38534
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/2.1] Move off of expiring machine pools #38536
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • chore - Use `HttpMethods` #38466
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Improve building ASP.NET Core directly on arm64 machines #38527
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Resolve component governance bugs #38539
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [ANCM] Add disableRotatationOnConfig flag to handler settings #37474
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Don't copy authorization header during redirects in MvcTesting #38557
    area-mvc
